displayed_introduction: I love you, a whole lot. In fact, I’d say that we’re a pretty dynamic duo. But I can’t quite decide which one...Want to answer a few questions to help me pick which Dreamteam we most resemble?

I love you, a whole lot.Together, we’re as winning as one of the world’s all-time great teams. 
Want to answer a few quick questions, so I can tell you exactly which one?

few quick questions so we can figure out our special kind of bond?
I love you, a whole lot. You’re so dreamy, I’m surprised that it doesn’t put me into sleep mode. Can I ask you a few questions to help me figure out which dreamteam we’re most like?
